jcr:content.jcr:description: Taking on the Altra Strava Love of Running 2022 Challenge? Check out the challenge terms and conditions to make sure you’re eligible for an Altra coupon code.
jcr:content.jcr:title: For the Love of Running Challenge

text.text:
ALTRA STRAVA FOR THE LOVE OF RUNNING CHALLENGE TERMS AND CONDITIONS

TERMS      

 I.               OVERVIEW OF OFFER

The Altra Strava Love Of Running 2023 Challenge (“Challenge”) involves running, walking, hiking or wheelchair 23 miles between 2/6/2023 and 2/19/2023. Beginning 2/6/23 at or after 12:01 a.m. Eastern Time (ET), go to the Challenge Gallery in the Explore tab or in the Feed area of the Strava App (as defined below) and select Challenge.

 

If you complete the Challenge, as recorded by the Strava App, you will receive a “completion badge” as well as a coupon code good for $23 off a qualifying purchase at www.altrarunning.com. By accepting the coupon code, you represent and warrant that you completed the Challenge as set forth in the Strava App.

 

II.             ELIGIBILITY

 

Offer is only available to legal U.S. residents, 18 years of age or older, who have  the Strava GPS Cycling and Running App installed on their mobile device (“Strava App”).  Both free and paid subscriptions to the Strava App qualify for the Offer and the type of subscription will not affect one’s ability to participate in the Offer.

 

III.           WARNING & RELEASE

 

BEFORE ENGAGING IN THE CHALLENGE, IT IS STRONGLY RECOMMENDED THAT YOU CONSULT WITH A PHYSICIAN OR HEALTH CARE PROFESSIONAL TO CONFIRM THAT YOU ARE IN SUITABLE PHYSICAL CONDITION TO DO SO. IN ELECTING TO ENGAGE IN THE CHALLENGE, YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT RUNNING CARRIES AN INHERENT RISK OF INJURY OR EVEN DEATH (INCLUDING SLIPS, FALLS, INJURY DUE TO THE EFFECTS OF WEATHER AND/OR ROAD CONDITIONS) AND, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, YOU RELEASE ALTRA RUNNING, A DIVISION OF VF OUTDOOR, LLC (“ALTRA RUNNING” OR “SPONSOR”) AND STRAVA, INC. FROM LIABILITY FOR SAME UNDER ANY LEGAL THEORY. 

 

IF YOU HAVE ANY DOUBTS AS TO YOUR ABILITY TO PARTICIPATE IN THE CHALLENGE OR DO NOT ACCEPT THE RISK OF INJURY/DEATH IN CONJUNCTION THEREWITH, YOU ARE ADVISED NOT TO TAKE PART IN THE CHALLENGE OR THIS OFFER.  

BY PARTICIPATING, YOU RELEASE AND AGREE TO HOLD HARMLESS SPONSOR AND STRAVA, INC.; THEIR RESPECTIVE PARENT COMPANIES, DIVISIONS, SUBSIDIARIES AND AFFILIATED COMPANIES; ALL OF THEIR RESPECTIVE OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, SHAREHOLDERS AND REPRESENTATIVES (COLLECTIVELY, THE “RELEASED PARTIES”) FROM AND AGAINST ANY AND ALL CLAIMS, EXPENSES AND LIABILITY, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO NEGLIGENCE, DAMAGES, OR INJURY OF ANY KIND TO PERSONS AND PROPERTY, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO PROPERTY DAMAGE, OR DEATH OR PERSONAL INJURY ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO SUCH PARTICIPATION IN THE OFFER; AND (C) INDEMNIFY, DEFEND AND HOLD HARMLESS THE RELEASED PARTIES FROM AND AGAINST ANY AND ALL CLAIMS, EXPENSES, AND LIABILITIES (INCLUDING REASONABLE ATTORNEYS’ FEES) ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO YOUR PARTICIPATION IN THE OFFER.

 

IV.           COUPON CODE

 

The coupon code will be delivered via Altra Running email within 1 - 3 days of completion of the Challenge. 

 

To redeem,  enter the coupon code at checkout and click “Apply A Promo Code.”

 

Coupon code valid until 3/30/2023 at 11:59 p.m. ET and is valid only for one-time use at www.altrarunning.com. Minimum purchase of $100 is required.  $23 discount is pre-tax and excludes expedited shipping charges.  This offer cannot be combined with any promo codes, coupons, offers or discounts. Offer excludes apparel, Vanish Carbon and discounted shoe items.

 

Coupon code is good only for original recipient of same (i.e., individual who completed Challenge) and is NOT transferable.  Sponsor reserves the right to verify identity of an individual before honoring coupon code; this and all decisions of Sponsor are final and binding. All purchases are subject to terms and conditions of www.altrarunning.com.

 

Sponsor not responsible if the coupon code is lost, stolen, destroyed or used without recipient’s permission or for technological failure/error/malfunction of any kind (regarding redemption of coupon code, participating in Challenge or otherwise involved in participating in the Offer). Remaining balance of merchandise purchase must be paid using another form of payment.

 

Coupon code cannot be redeemed for cash or applied as payment to any account. Coupon code is not transferable and not to be republished. No price adjustment allowed on previous purchases, product returns/exchanges or purchases made without use of the coupon code

 

V.            ADDITIONAL CONDITIONS

 

Strava, Inc. will only provide “completion badge” and Sponsor will only provide the $23 coupon code if the Strava App determines that the user has run 23 miles between 2/6/2023 and 2/19/2023.  Strava, Inc.’s determination of user’s completion of the Challenge is final and binding in all respects, with Sponsor relying on the accuracy of same as to implementation of the Offer. Sponsor disclaims any and all liability under any legal theory for the operation of Strava App and/or Strava, Inc.’s determination that a given user has (or has not) completed the Challenge. Any attempt by an individual to undermine the operation of the Strava App or this Offer, including but not limited to any misrepresentation or deception of any kind as to whether he/she/they actually completed the Challenge will result in disqualification from the Offer, voiding of any coupon code provided to such individual (with such individual being responsible for the entire price of items purchased using coupon code) and possible legal sanctions.

 

Consumer is solely responsible for wireless Internet access fees and/or other charges imposed by wireless carrier.

 

Information collected from participants is subject to the Sponsor’s Privacy Policy, which is available at: www.altrarunning.com/privacy-policy.html as well as Strava, Inc.’s Privacy Policy, which is available at https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy. 

 

No variance from these terms and conditions allowed except as required by law.  Void where prohibited, taxed or restricted. Offer subject to change at any time without notice. 

 

SPONSOR: Altra Running, a division of VF Outdoor, LLC, 1551 Wewatta St., Denver, CO 80202.
